job.title: Software Engineer (Entry level)
job.description: pClient is a team of software architecture specialists bilingual in business and technology who set the standard for architecture excellence in the insurance and healthcare industries Careers with the client offer rapid growth constant learning and the immediate chance to make an impact From day one here youll be working sidebyside with our senior architects contributing to highimpact projects and meeting with our clients face toface Its a true meritocracy  fueled by a diversity of backgrounds cultures and experiencesppnbspppnbspGet involved in all phases of a project from discovery and planning through implementation  and deliveryppnbspParticipate in architecture definition product selection and application designppnbspDesign and develop core business applications for insurance healthcare and other industriesppnbspWear many hats and gain experience with tools technologies and platforms across many technology stacksppnbspWork closely with Senior Developers and ArchitectsppnbspLearn new things and grow rapidly from constant exposure to innovative ideas concepts and patternsppnbspppstrongQUALIFICATIONSstrongppstrongnbspstrongppnbspDesign and develop business applications and integration solutions using JavaJ2EE NET and JavascriptppnbspDegree in Computer Science or equivalent is preferredppnbspKnowledge of design patterns and the ability to apply themppnbspStrong problem solving skillsppnbspAbility to conceptualize and articulate ideas clearly and conciselyppnbspExcellent communication and interpersonal skillsppnbspWillingness to travel on an occasional basis as local and possibly outofstate travel is requiredppnbspppstrongOUR PHILOSOPHIESstrongppstrongnbspstrongppnbspAgile approach  emphasis on good people continuous delivery of value close collaboration with clientsppnbspLearning and reuse by leveraging patterns and frameworksppnbspSmall teams focused on full lifecycle from discovery and planning through implementation and launchppnbspNo technology bias and no affiliations with vendors  we use the technologies and approaches that make sense for our clientsppnbspConstant learning  adding modern technologies frameworks tools and products to our tool beltppbrppstrong WORK ENVIRONMENT AND CULTUREstrongppstrongnbspstrongppnbspBe surrounded by smart talented people with shared values of continually challenging investing in and stretching themselves to new levelsppnbspCollaborate with seasoned architects to solve problems and to challenge assumptionsppnbspWork in small teams with opportunities for rapid growth and accelerated responsibilities driven purely by individual performanceppnbspSmall company  open environment flat organization casual attire flexibility and no hierarchical structuresppnbspEveryone has a voice and is always encouraged to engage in shaping the company by sharing their interests ideas and feedbackppnbspppstrongBENEFITS AND PERKSstrongppstrongnbspstrongppWhen it comes to our benefits and perks we have everything youd expect from health insurance retirementppbenefits and so on But like our name even our benefits exceed expectationsppbrppnbspnbspHealth Vision Dental Life Disabilityppnbspnbsp401k with employer matchppnbspnbspAnnual raises and promotions based on individual performanceppnbspnbspPrograms Professional Development Wellness Professional Dress allowanceppnbspnbspDiscretionary Points and Travel Points redeemable for cash or additional time offppnbspnbspCompany sponsored social events for employees and familiesppnbspnbspWorkLife Balance flexible hours vacation days unlimited sick days personal days holidaysp
